title: [Large-scale] AR/VR Integration Training Program Design for Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Science Subject Content Knowledge and Basic Digital Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Development and Application of Teaching Methods Utilizing AR/VR in Smartphone-Centric Restricted Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute science experiment simulations using AR/VR-based TSED (Technology-Enhanced Science Education Design) models.
Learners can explain the process of creating smartphone-based AR content to enhance accessibility of digital tools.
Learners can apply AR/VR instructional materials developed through project-based assessment to actual classes and analyze their effectiveness.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
